description:
This course offer:

- 34 videos, of which 32 are lessons.

- 10 PDF with grammar and vocabulary.

- Are animated videos.

- More than 90 minutes of duration.

This course is for people within low and medium level of Spanish.

Learning Spanish can be fun.

This course is intended to help you become conversational in basic Spanish.

You will learn to talk about the following things in Spanish:

Questions.

Directions.

Real Situations of Life.

Correct pronunciation.

Verbs and adverbs. (basic level).

Adjectives, prepositions.

Spanish culture, food and drink.

Learning a language is not a race, so don't be afraid to take your time or to go back and review as necessary. Can see videos everytime you want.

I hope you learn and enjoy it.

This is my first course in Udemy. In the coming months I hope to publish some more:

Spanish advanced, Spanish Grammar, etc.

Don't miss my next courses.

Greetings.

El curso se compone de 34 vídeos, con 32 lecciones, y además 10 archivos adjuntos con gramática, vocabulario, expresiones útiles, pronombres y más.

Todo el curso está realizado con dibujos animados, intentando que sea lo más entretenido posible para el estudiante.

Espero que os guste y disfrutéis haciéndolo.

Saludos y muchas gracias por matricularte con nosotros.
title: Spanish: Survival Manual.
